name: Microwave Spaghetti Bolognese Plates with Garlic Baguette and Salad
description: Heat a family-size spaghetti bolognese, warm a garlic baguette, and serve with a ready salad for a fast, no-heat kid-friendly dinner.
prep_steps: Set out 4 dinner plates and 4 bowls.
Open the spaghetti bolognese tray and loosen the film as directed.
Place the garlic baguette on a microwave-safe plate.
Open the salad and have salad dressing and parmesan cheese ready.
cook_steps: Microwave the spaghetti bolognese according to pack directions (typically 5–7 minutes), stirring halfway if instructed.
Microwave the garlic baguette until warm (typically 1–2 minutes; or bake in oven per pack if preferred).
Toss the salad with salad dressing in a large bowl.
Divide the spaghetti bolognese into bowls, sprinkle with parmesan cheese if using, and serve with slices of warm garlic baguette and salad on the side.
